languages.text: "Впрочем, я здесь не для того, чтобы упрекать за былое. Я желаю поведать о видениях, что все чаще приходят ко мне во время варп-перелетов. Они повторяются снова, и снова, и снова... Я словно схожу с ума, ибо видения связаны со мной, Атласом и Тисифоной Орселлио, предыдущим новатором Дома. Я узрела эксперименты Тисифоны, в которых принимали участие навигаторы из ветви Сеттала, по слухам умерщвленной ей самой за неподчинение".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, я здесь не для того, чтобы упрекать за былое. Я желаю поведать о видениях, что все чаще приходят ко мне во время варп-перелетов. Они повторяются снова, и снова, и снова... Я словно схожу с ума, ибо видения связаны со мной, Атласом и Тисифоной Орселлио, предыдущим новатором Дома. Я узрела эксперименты Тисифоны, в которых принимали участие Навигаторы из ветви Сеттала, по слухам умерщвленной ей самой за неподчинение".

languages.text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, я здесь не для того, чтобы упрекать за былое. Я желаю поведать о видениях, что все чаще приходят ко мне во время варп-перелетов. Они повторяются снова, и снова, и снова... Я словно схожу с ума, ибо видения связаны со мной, Атласом и Тисифоной Орселлио, предыдущим новатором Дома. traits.locale_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of your past. I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience more and more frequently during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It's like I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I see Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

I see Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

"However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

languages.text: 「ですが、あたくしはかつての{name}様の行いを糾弾するために来たのではありません。ワープジャンプの最中によく見るようになったビジョンについてお伝えしたいのです。同じビジョンが現れるのです、何度も、何度も、何度も…あたくしの気が触れてしまったかのようです。実は、これらのビジョンはあたくし、アトラス、そしてオーセリオ家の前ノベイターであるティシフォン・オーセリオに関するものなのです。ティシフォンの実験を見たことがありますが、分家のセッタラ家出身の航宙士が関わっていました。反逆を理由にティシフォンに殺されたと噂された人物です」
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、あたくしはかつての{name}様の行いを糾弾するために来たのではありません。ワープジャンプの最中によく見るようになったビジョンについてお伝えしたいのです。同じビジョンが現れるのです、何度も、何度も、何度も…あたくしの気が触れてしまったかのようです。実は、これらのビジョンはあたくし、アトラス、そしてオーセリオ家の前ノベイターであるティシフォン・オーセリオに関するものなのです。ティシフォンの実験を見たことがありますが、分家のセッタラ家出身の航宙士が関わっていました。反逆を理由にティシフォンに殺されたと噂された人物です」

languages.text: “不过，我并不是要责备你的所作所为。相反，我想告诉你的是，在穿越亚空间的过程中，我看到的幻象越来越多。同样的幻觉一次又一次出现在我眼前……我觉得我要发疯了。如你所知，那些幻象都是关于我、关于群星圣仪，以及奥赛罗家族的前任大族长提西福涅·奥赛罗。我看到了提西福涅的实验，还有关于塞塔拉家族导航者的实验。传言说，她杀光了塞塔拉家族所有导航者，因为那个家族的人不服从她的命令。”
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我并不是要责备你的所作所为。相反，我想告诉你的是，在穿越亚空间的过程中，我看到的幻象越来越多。同样的幻觉一次又一次出现在我眼前……我觉得我要发疯了。如你所知，那些幻象都是关于我、关于群星圣仪，以及奥塞罗家族的前任大族长提西福涅·奥塞罗。我看到了提西福涅的实验，还有关于塞塔拉家族导航者的实验。传言说，她杀光了塞塔拉家族所有导航者，因为那个家族的人不服从她的命令。”

languages.text: « Cela dit, je ne suis pas là pour vous reprocher vos actions passées. Je souhaitais vous faire part de visions qui m'apparaissent de plus en plus régulièrement lors des sauts Warp. Il s'agit d'ailleurs systématiquement des mêmes visions qui se répètent en boucle, et j'ai l'impression de devenir folle. Voyez-vous, elles me concernent moi, l'Atlas, et Tisiphone Orsellio, la précédente Novator de ma maison. J'ai déjà vu à quelles expériences Tisiphone s'était adonnée sur les navigateurs du clan Setthala, qu'elle aurait détruit pour lui avoir désobéi. »
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, je ne suis pas là pour vous reprocher vos actions passées. Je souhaitais vous faire part de visions qui m'apparaissent de plus en plus régulièrement lors des sauts Warp. Il s'agit d'ailleurs systématiquement des mêmes visions qui se répètent en boucle, et j'ai l'impression de devenir folle. Voyez-vous, elles me concernent moi, l'Atlas, et Tisiphone Orsellio, la précédente Novator de ma maison. J'ai déjà vu à quelles expériences Tisiphone s'était adonnée sur les navigateurs du clan Setthala, qu'elle aurait détruit pour lui avoir désobéi. »

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no estoy aquí para reprocharle sus actos. No, he venido para hablarle de las visiones que he experimentado cada vez con mayor frecuencia durante los saltos de disformidad. Las mismas visiones me asaltan una y otra vez, y otra, y otra... Es como si me estuviese volviendo loca. Y es porque tales visiones son sobre mí, el Atlas y Tisiphone Orsellio, la anterior Novator de mi dinastía. He visto los experimentos de Tisiphone, esos que involucraron a los navegantes de la rama Setthala, que según los rumores fue erradicada por insumisión».
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, no estoy aquí para reprocharle sus actos. No, he venido para hablarle de las visiones que he experimentado cada vez con mayor frecuencia durante los saltos a la disformidad. Las mismas visiones me asaltan una y otra vez, y otra, y otra... Es como si me estuviese volviendo loca. Y es porque tales visiones son sobre mí, el Atlas y Tisiphone Orsellio, la anterior Novator de mi dinastía. He visto los experimentos de Tisiphone, esos que involucraron a los navegantes de la rama Setthala, que según los rumores fue erradicada por insumisión».

languages.text: "Ich bin aber nicht hier, um Euch für alte Taten zu tadeln. Stattdessen will ich Euch von den Visionen berichten, die ich während Warpsprüngen immer häufiger erlebe. Dieselben Visionen ereilen mich wieder und wieder und wieder ... Es ist, als würde ich den Verstand verlieren. Denn wisst Ihr, in diesen Visionen geht es um mich, um den Atlas und um Tisiphone Orsellio, die frühere Novatorin des Hauses. Ich habe Tisiphones Experimente gesehen, die Experimente mit den Navigatoren der Setthalas, die sie Gerüchten zufolge wegen Ungehorsams ausgelöscht haben soll."
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin aber nicht hier, um Euch für alte Taten zu tadeln. Stattdessen will ich Euch von den Visionen berichten, die ich während Warpsprüngen immer häufiger erlebe. Dieselben Visionen ereilen mich wieder und wieder und wieder ... Es ist, als würde ich den Verstand verlieren. Denn wisst Ihr, in diesen Visionen geht es um mich, um den Atlas und um Tisiphone Orsellio, die frühere Novatorin des Hauses. Ich habe Tisiphones Experimente gesehen, die Experimente mit den Navigatoren der Setthalas, die sie Gerüchten zufolge wegen Ungehorsams ausgelöscht haben soll."

languages.text: "Gelgelelim buraya daha önceki hareketlerin için sana sitem etmeye gelmedim. Onun yerine sana öte sıçramalar sırasında gitgide daha sık görmeye başladığım görüleri anlatmak istiyorum. Karşıma sürekli aynı şeyler çıkıp duruyor. Delirmek üzereyim sanki. Kendimle, Atlas'la ve Hanemin önceki Rota Reisi Tisiphone Orsellio'yla ilgili görüler görüyorum. Tisiphone'nin deneylerini gördüm. Bu deneylerde, itaatsizlik ettikleri için yok ettiği söylenen Setthala soyundan Rotacılar vardı."
languages.original_text: "However, I am not here to reproach you for the deeds of yore. Instead, I wish to tell you of the visions that I have come to experience at an increasing rate during warp jumps. The same visions come to me again, and again, and again... It is as if I am going mad. For you see, these visions are about me, the Atlas, and Tisiphone Orsellio, the House's previous Novator. I have seen Tisiphone's experiments, the ones that involved the Navigators from the Setthala branch, which she was rumoured to have destroyed for disobedience."

traits.locale_text: "Gelgelelim buraya daha önceki hareketlerin için sana sitem etmeye gelmedim. Onun yerine sana öte sıçramalar sırasında gitgide daha sık görmeye başladığım görüleri anlatmak istiyorum. Karşıma sürekli aynı görüler çıkıp duruyor... Delirmek üzereyim sanki. Kendimle, Atlas'la ve Hanemin önceki Rota Reisi olan Tisiphone Orsellio'yla ilgili görüler görüyorum. Tisiphone'nin deneylerini gördüm. Bu deneylerde, itaatsizlik ettikleri için yok ettiği söylenen Setthala soyundan Rotacılar vardı."
